name: CC0 1.0
description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, even for commercial purposes.
more: CC0: This work has been marked as dedicated to the public domain.

name: CC BY 4.0
description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, even for commercial purposes.
more: BY: Credit must be given to you, the creator.

name: CC BY-SA 4.0
description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, even for commercial purposes. If others remix, adapt, or build upon the material, they must license the modified material under identical terms.
more: BY: Credit must be given to you, the creator.
SA: Adaptations must be shared under the same terms.

name: CC BY-ND 4.0
description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to copy and distribute the material in any medium or format in unadapted form only, even for commercial purposes.
more: BY: Credit must be given to you, the creator.
ND: No derivatives or adaptations of your work are permitted.

name: CC BY-NC 4.0
description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, for noncommercial purposes only.
more: BY: Credit must be given to you, the creator.
NC: Only noncommercial use of your work is permitted.

description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to distribute, remix, adapt, and build upon the material in any medium or format, for noncommercial purposes only. If others modify or adapt the material, they must license the modified material under identical terms.
more: BY: Credit must be given to you, the creator.
SA: Adaptations must be shared under the same terms.

name: CC BY-NC-ND 4.0
description: This license requires that reusers give credit to the creator. It allows reusers to copy and distribute the material in any medium or format in unadapted form and for noncommercial purposes only.
more: BY: Credit must be given to you, the creator.
NC: Only noncommercial use of your work is permitted.
